content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
To keep swinging away try our new game Everybody's Golf!

End of Service Announcement for Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational™

Thank you for playing Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational™

Online services for Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational™ will end on December 21, 2017 at 0:00am PST/3:00am EST.

Online features will not be playable after servers close. You can continue playing offline modes.

There is only a short amount of time remaining, however Hot Shots Golf™:World Invitational development and operations team hope that you can all continue to enjoy our title until the end of service. And we would like to extend our thanks and best wishes to you all who continue to enjoy and play our game.

The over-the-top golf franchise is now available for the PlayStation®3 system with added features and content:
- Full HD
- Pre-loaded with characters Erika and Gloria and the Mt. Sakura and Mar Cielo courses
- Supports Move Controller for realistic golf swing
- Slot mode to keep multi-player rounds competitive
- Quick rounds on Par 3 courses
- Shared online lobby with PS Vita version

This item is being licensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.

This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation® devices associated with this Sony Entertainment Network Account. Please see software description for device compatibility.

©2013 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. Hot Shots Golf and Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational are trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
